T

transfer(EthereumTransactionInput, byte) - 接口 中的方法com.hc.blockchain.service.wallet.IEthereumTransactionService
以太币转账接口 EthereumTransactionInput input = new EthereumTransactionInput(); // 1.默认账户from转出 String from = "0x4a85bcca41b6414e0c140261edf376ada8d9a68f"; // 2.默认账户to转入 string to = "0x748D0D20624084401cd7904847A8e6b7Daf60A48"; // 3.金额 单位ether String amount = "1"; input.setAmount(amount); input.setFrom(from); input.setTo(to); // 21000固定 input.setGasLimit("21000"); // 单位Gwei String gasPrice = "3"; input.setGasPrice(gasPrice); input.setKeystore("{\"address\":\"4a85bcca41b6414e0c140261edf376ada8d9a68f\", \"id\":\"8dfa50ea-ace7-4e3d-abbb-e6851e9745d3\",\"version\":3,\"crypto\":{\"cipher\":\"aes-128-ctr\",\"ciphertext\":\"4d810ddbff76afa9f6a729429cbee8665c3d3a505309d9b79b29d6ae45bf1727\",\"cipherparams\":{\"iv\":\"f74084b7352ea9635c0528be824591ae\"},\"kdf\":\"scrypt\",\"kdfparams\":{\"dklen\":32,\"n\":4096,\"p\":6,\"r\":8,\"salt\":\"6fab03d958268ced7d8abb964119e5cf94851f26a57dfd65ba1f076f40f6dd5d\"},\"mac\":\"48f94954f9339d6ff2a0acd80536128a32bddb5b26d5a8f7291e5cf159cbb5ce\"}}"); input.setPassword("123456789"); // 4.执行转账 测试使用chainID:3 TransactionOutput output = service.transfer(input,ChainId.ROPSTEN);
transfer(TokenTransactionInput, byte) - 接口 中的方法com.hc.blockchain.service.wallet.ITokenTransactionService
代币转账接口 TokenTransactionInput input = new TokenTransactionInput(); // 1.默认账户from转出 String from = "0x938219B7D0BcF136110d745369A4872C862BaC3e"; // 2.默认账户to转入 String to = "0xf9a9bF738E4c6F7875ccfc1c854D7740a2ecaC44"; // 合约地址 String contractAddress = "0x3989a352dddef646168cd885f637f63ebb9b121c"; // 3.金额 String amount = "200"; input.setContractAddress(contractAddress); input.setAmount(amount); input.setFrom(from); input.setTo(to); input.setGasLimit("21000"); String gasPrice = "3"; input.setGasPrice(gasPrice); input.setKeystore("{\"address\":\"938219b7d0bcf136110d745369a4872c862bac3e\", \"id\":\"f39c7851-268c-4255-84b9-2ed062126c7c\",\"version\":3,\"crypto\":{\"cipher\":\"aes-128-ctr\",\"ciphertext\":\"7b2b4c834693d792bce8880dd0d968f627b5c29e5be525cab984fff7da7e89af\",\"cipherparams\":{\"iv\":\"f1982fd4b44e1ff03e231197999c73c8\"},\"kdf\":\"scrypt\",\"kdfparams\":{\"dklen\":32,\"n\":4096,\"p\":6,\"r\":8,\"salt\":\"a0fa354e2256c2726588d8872db72e4752e0b920d90ee5fa2c20076faa5fd75c\"},\"mac\":\"d03975a6282cb45e1f37b743c17efdbee67da32c9d0785deb5b6031e37cdb73a\"}}"); input.setPassword("123456789"); // 4.执行转账 TransactionOutput output = service.transfer(input, ChainId.Ropsten);
